original: Forssman, Helge Otto Fredrik, överstelöjtnant, brandchef, Växjö, f. 15/6/ 80 i Finnerödja, Skarab. 1., av kapt. Otto Reinhold F. o. Olga Sallberg. G. 07 m. Gabriella von Essen. Barn: Margareta f. 14. — Stud:ex. i Karlskrona 00, off :ex. 02, KHS 11-13. Und:-löjtn. v. Kronob. reg. 02, löjtn. 06, kapt. 16, major v. Karlskrona gren:-reg. 26, v. Kronob. reg. 28, övrlöjtn. i armén 33. Asp. v. gen:staben 15-17, reg :kvartermäst. 20-23, kommend. v. armén i Schweiz 25. V. brandchef i Växjö 18, brandchef där fr. 22. För-sv:assist. i Kronob. 1. 37-44, länsbrand-insp. där 45, led. av stadsfullm. (h) 30-37, v. ordf. i Kronob. 1. brandkårs-förb. 30 o. i Sv. brandskyddsfören. 35-47, ordf. i Sv. brandbefäl-sförb. 40-47, ordf. i brandskoileutredn. 40-41, led. av brandförsv :utredn. 41-42 o. av sko’gs-brandsläckn :komm. 42-46, ordf. i Växjö stads idr:nd. Skr.: ett flert. art. i facktidskr. rör. brandväsen samt ungdom o. brandskydd. RSO 23, RVO 36, KDDO 47.
translated:
Forssman, Helge Otto Fredrik, Lieutenant Colonel, Fire Chief, Växjö, born June 15th, 1880 in Finnerödja, Skaraborg County, the first born of Captain Otto Reinhold F. and Olga Sallberg. Married in 1907 to Gabriella von Essen. They have one child named Margareta, born in 1914. 

Forssman obtained a High School degree in Karlskrona in 1900, became an officer graduate in 1902 and attended the Royal Swedish Army Staff College from 1911-1913. He was a Second Lieutenant in the Kronoberg Regiment in 1902, a Lieutenant in 1906, a Captain in 1916, and a Major in the Karlskrona Grenadier Regiment in 1926. He later served as a Major in the Kronoberg Regiment in 1928 and was promoted to Lieutenant Colonel in the army in 1933. Forssman was Assistant Adjutant-General from 1915-1917, Quartermaster Officer from 1920-1923, and Commander of the Army in Switzerland in 1925. He was Deputy Fire Chief in Växjö in 1918, and served as Fire Chief there from 1922. 

Forssman served as Assistant Inspector of the Kronoberg Fire Department from 1937-1944 and as County Fire Inspector there in 1945. He was a member of the City Council (right wing) from 1930-1937, Vice President of the Kronoberg Fire Brigade Association from 1930 and President of the Swedish Fire Protection Association from 1935-1947. He was also the President of the Swedish Fire Chiefs' Association from 1940-1947, Chairman of the Fire Education Committee from 1940-1941, a member of the Fire Defense Commission from 1941-1942, and a member of the Forest Fire Extinguishing Commission from 1942-1946. Forssman was Chairman of the Växjö City Sports Association and authored several articles on fire protection and youth protection. 

He was awarded the Order of the Sword in 1923, the Order of Vasa in 1936, and the King's Medal in 1947.

structured.name: Helge Otto Fredrik Forssman
structured.description: Helge Otto Fredrik Forssman was a Swedish Lieutenant Colonel and Fire Chief born on June 15th, 1880 in Finnerödja, Skaraborg County. He was the first born of Captain Otto Reinhold F. and Olga Sallberg. He obtained a High School degree from Karlskrona High School in 1900, became an officer graduate in 1902 and attended the Royal Swedish Army Staff College from 1911-1913.
